thread.title: Russia's Lavrov says western strikes on Syria 'unacceptable and lawless'

title: Russia's Lavrov says western strikes on Syria 'unacceptable and lawless'
text:
April 14, 2018 / 3:52 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago Russia's Lavrov says western strikes on Syria 'unacceptable and lawless' Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Saturday that U.S.-led strikes on Syria were “unacceptable and lawless.” Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov attends a meeting with his Dutch counterpart Stef Blok in Moscow, Russia April 13, 2018. REUTERS/Grigory Dukor 
Speaking at an assembly of the Council on Foreign and Defense Policy, Lavrov said he would talk “about how our western partners explain their absolutely lawless and unacceptable actions” in Syria. Reporting by Andrey Ostroukh; Editing by Toby Chopra
